channel.title: Sending Dueling Request
channel.description:
Yeah, see, i have added about 75-80% duel arena including staking. I have a shit load of errors but this is probably the most difficult and i don't know how to make it work >.<.
I'm trying to make when i player clicks on, "duel with" on another player, it would say at the bottom;
[code]"Sending dueling request, Please wait..." [/code]
Or whatever it says.
Now, i know it has to do with case 139 i believe, and i found this in my player.java: [code] public int duelStatus = -1; // 0 = Requesting duel, 1 = in duel screen, 2 = waiting for other player to accept, 3 = in duel, 4 = won.[/code]
So all you great coders, please help? :|
Thanks you all.
Ps: I might release the dueling arena if i get it done.

item.title: Sending Dueling Request
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[quote=“iat3acowonc3, post:1, topic:261694”]I need help with dueling arena please. Do you know how to make a screen pop up with the stake i can only get the people to teleport.

Thx,
Iat3acowonc3[/quote]

Read the date the thread was posted on next time.

Read full topic

@jc22493 wrote:

Thx,
Iat3acowonc3[/quote]
Just make it show the duel interface.

item.title: Sending Dueling Request
item.dc:creator: @Kubanito Kubanito
item.description:
@Kubanito wrote:

Yeah, see, i have added about 75-80% duel arena including staking.
I have a shit load of errors but this is probably the most difficult and i don’t know how to make it work >.<.

I’m trying to make when i player clicks on, “duel with” on another player, it would say at the bottom;

"Sending dueling request, Please wait..."

Or whatever it says.

Now, i know it has to do with case 139 i believe, and i found this in my player.java:

public int duelStatus = -1; // 0 = Requesting duel, 1 = in duel screen, 2 = waiting for other player to accept, 3 = in duel, 4 = won.

So all you great coders, please help?

Thanks you all.

Ps: I might release the dueling arena if i get it done.

Read full topic
